definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a prism ; having the form of a prism; containing one or more prisms.
Separated or distributed by, or as if by, a transparent prism; formed by a prism; varied or brilliant in color .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to a prism ; having the form of a prism; containing one or more prisms.
secondary_definitions: Separated or distributed by, or as if by, a transparent prism; formed by a prism; varied or brilliant in color .
